dialogue.text:
Welcome to "Breaking the Silence", a VR narrative experience where words have power, and conversations shape your story. In this game, you step into the role of a social worker student. Tonight, you are attending a family dinner where difficult discussions will arise. When your father makes a racist remark, you must decide how to respond. 

Every choice has consequences, shown through pop up feedbacks. Explore the apartment to find interactive objects, a newspaper, a family photo or your phone, that might help you build your argument.

This game is not about winning, it is about understanding how a conversation can create change over time.
